resources.string: Controls the accent color. Takes effect when you leave this page
Controls the background color. Takes effect when you leave this page
Do you want to add a link to Jockey that matches your current theme to your launcher?
When a new song is chosen, the Now Playing page will be opened
Changing songs won\'t navigate to another page
Album artwork and other data will always be downloaded
Album artwork and other data will only be downloaded on Wi-Fi
Help make Jockey better by sending anonymous usage data
Anonymous usage data and crash information will be sent to Marverenic
Only anonymous crash information will be sent to Marverenic
Swipe across the album art to skip songs, or tap to play/pause music
Tap and hold for more options

It looks like you have another app that manages audio effects. This may cause problems with Jockey's equalizer, so be prepared to turn this off if you notice unexpected behavior. 

To use the global equalizer, disable Jockey's equalizer and tap Equalizer in the settings page. 
To return to this page, tap and hold Equalizer in the settings page.
